Docs.param: True indicates that tracked operations succeeded.
Tracked files to be removed from TLogs.
Docs.summary: Compact and finalize the Tlogs based on the success of the tracked execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once tracked operations have been completed then we need to compact / finalize the Tlogs based on the success of the tracked execution. If it fails, then we clean out the TLogs. If it succeeds then we clean temporary files from the TLogs and re-write them.

Docs.summary: Checks if the tracking data indicates that everything is up to date according to UpToDateCheckType.

Docs.summary: Checks if the tracking data indicates that everything is up to date according to UpToDateCheckType.
Docs.returns: if everything is up to date; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If things are not up to date, then the TLogs are compacted to remove all entries in preparation to re-track execution of work.

Docs.summary: Checks if state is up-to-date state according to the tracking data and the UpToDateCheckType.
Docs.returns: if everything is up to date; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks No tracking log compaction will take place when using this overload
